channel.title: Npc troubles!
channel.description:
[center][size=50pt]NPC TROUBLES[/size][/center] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [color=blue]Hello, on all the servers i have ever had. Belive it or not, but i never learnt how to add npc's. DNT lol at me to much.... I have seen many guides and none of them helped. I am not sure if this is the correct section to post in, but like i said "first post" will anyone make a nice npc adding guide for me here, or on a tutorial page with link.[/color]
Thanks, N3W J0K C1TY ;D

item.title: Npc troubles!
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Give more info when you post pl0x.

Yes hes right, there in autospawn.cfg.
but this is in wrong sec anyway.

Read full topic

item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

They are added in autospawn.cfg.
